nodes.text: The Force Enclave was a branch of the Eternal Alliance that was founded around 3631 BBY with the intention to train Force-sensitive individuals to use the Force. But members were not trained as Jedi as Sith so much as neutral practitioners that were instructed to connect to the Force itself rather than Jedi or Sith philosophies. The intention was further extended to the need for its recruits to learn both sides to the Force in order to achieve a perfect balance.

The enclave's leader Sana-Rae, believed in perfect and harmonious balance in the Force's two aspects and decided to balance both Jedi and Sith principles into one cohesive platform. Per this plan based upon her vision she also attracted several other Voss to train at the enclave with her. Sana-Rae enlisted the Commander's aid in expanding the enclave and in acquiring different artifacts and relics that could help instruct them in their studies.
The enclave was asked to monitor for any remaining signs of Valkorion in the aftermath of Valkorion's final defeat, which Sana-Rae found to be a sound precaution.
